questions.question: 1. A pure culture is best defined as

answers.a: group of microorganisms which are genetically different
answers.b: group of microorganisms that are genetically similar
answers.c: group of microorganisms which are genetically similar, but morphologically different

questions.question: 2. During streak plate technique, the loop is heated in between the sector of quadrants. This ensures

answers.c: To differentiate Gram positive and Gram negative bacteria

questions.question: 3. The order of growth seen in the first, second, third and the fourth quadrant of a four quadrant streak plate

answers.a: Heavy confluent growth, dense growth, weak growth and isolated colonies
answers.b: Weak growth, heavy confluent growth, dense growth, isolated colonies
answers.c: Dense growth, heavy confluent growth, weak growth , isolated colonies
